body: Creatures with the giant template are larger and stronger than their normal-sized kin. This template cannot be applied to creatures that are Colossal.
name: Giant Creature

sections.body: +2 on all rolls based on Str or Con, +2 hp/HD, –1 penalty on all rolls based on Dex.
sections.name: Quick Rules

sections.body: Size increase by one category; AC increase natural armor by +3; Attacks increase dice rolled by 1 step; Ability Scores +4 size bonus to Str and Con, –2 Dex.
sections.name: Rebuild Rules
